title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 427.5 - Basic training time completion requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 427.5 - Basic training time completion requirements

State Regulations

The 18-month period established by section
426.5
of this Chapter is the
permitted maximum. Within a given municipality, actual time for completion may
be further limited. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
427.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
